name: Better-Than-Grilled Cheese Tomato Soup
author: Dezzie
summary: This tomato soup is perfect with grilled cheese.
ingredients: 1 (15 ounce) can fire-roasted diced tomatoes, partially drained
1 bunch fresh basil, roughly chopped, or to taste
directions: Heat butter and olive oil together in a large pot over medium heat; saute onion and carrot until softened, 4 to 6 minutes
Add garlic, salt, pepper, and red pepper flakes; cook and stir until fragrant, about 2 minutes
Stir crushed tomatoes, tomato juice, and diced tomatoes into onion mixture; bring to a simmer
Reduce heat, stir sugar into tomato mixture, and simmer until heated through, about 10 minutes
Add cream and simmer until heated through, 1 to 2 minutes
Add basil to soup and cook until wilted, about 3 minutes
Serve chunky or puree with an immersion blender
